AUTHOR: Redjumpman
INSTALL_MSG:
This cog requires tabulate use pip3 install tabulate in cmd prompt.
This cog integrates with Economy
PM me at Redjumpman#2375 if you have issues.
NAME: Heist
SHORT: Heist mini-game inspired by Twitch's deep bot
DESCRIPTION:
Plays through a bank heist with different outcomes to steal credits in the vault.
 Credit to Aikaterna for helping me test this cog.
